title: Single for the Holidays
itunes:title: Single for the Holidays
itunes:subtitle: Single for the Holidays
description:
This show is all about helping you have better sex & better relationships over the holidays. Emily answers some listener emails on one night stands, sexual confidence and how to make sex better with an inexperienced partner. Plus, New York columnist Annie Daly calls in to talk holiday hookups, relationships and dating trends.

Are you suffering from mistletoe syndrome? Emily explains why it’s okay to fly solo this time of year, and shares tips to help you embrace being single for the holidays.

With all the hype this time of year, it might feel like a rough time to be alone. But whether you’re coupled up, or just doing you, this Podcast will help you to survive and thrive through the holiday season. Check it out!

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
